name: Mindfulness Mastery
text: The act of meditation allows you to steel your mind against mental attacks.
prerequisites: Wis 19, Meditation Master, Mindful Meditation, character level 13th.
benefit: For 24 hours after you meditate, whenever you fail your saving throw against a charm, compulsion, emotion, or fear effect, you can attempt a new saving throw again 1 round later at the same DC. You get only this one extra chance to succeed at your saving throw.
text_zh: 进行冥想会强化你的精神以对抗精神攻击。
prerequisites_zh: 感知19，冥想大师，正觉冥想，角色等级13。
benefit_zh: 在你冥想后的24小时内，每当你在对抗魅惑，胁迫，情绪和恐惧效果的豁免中失败，你可以在1轮后以同样的DC重新进行一次检定。你只会获得这一次额外机会来使你的豁免检定成功。
